bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I like to land on plants.

bug.question: I make honey. I buzz and fly around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I like to visit pretty plants.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground, and I can carry crumbs. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am known for being strong.

bug.question: I wiggle in the dirt, and birds like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌧️ I come out when it rains.
🐦 Some animals enjoy snacking on me.

bug.question: I can jump really high and I'm usually green. What am I?
I spin a web, and catch bugs for my dinner. What am I?
I start as a caterpillar and end up with pretty wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I'm young.
✨ I go through a big change.
🦋 I can fly in the sky.

bug.question: I have a hard shell and sometimes pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I live in the water or on land.

bug.question: I fly at night and am attracted to light. Sometimes people think I am a butterfly, but I fly when it is dark. What am I?

hints.text: 💡 I like to fly around lamps.
🦋 I'm related to butterflies, but different.

bug.question: I make a loud noise in the summer and live in trees. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I live in trees for many years when I am young.
☀️ You hear me when the sun is hot.
🎶 I make a buzzing, chirping sound.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy. What am I?

hints.text: ☃️ You can make snowballs with me.

weather.question: I help plants grow, and you need me to play outside. What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm out.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, splash in puddles, and help flowers grow. What am I?
I move the leaves on the trees, and can fly your kite. What am I?

hints.text: 🌬️ I can be gentle or strong.
🍃 You can't see me, but you can feel me.

weather.question: I am big and white or grey and float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I can look like a fluffy sheep.

weather.question: I am rain, but very very cold, like tiny balls of ice. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 Sometimes I hurt when I fall on you.

weather.question: I am a very, very hot and giant ball of fire. I give light to the Earth. What am I?
I am a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌦️ I appear when the sun shines after rain.
🍀 Some people think there is a pot of gold at my end.

weather.question: I am a loud crash in the sky during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I follow a flash of light.

weather.question: Sometimes I hide the sun and make it hard to see. I'm like a cloud on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 You have to drive slowly in me.
